skillTiers.name: Target Practice
skillTiers.description: Learn to remain steady and shoot under all conditions and from all angles to always hit the mark.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.

skillTiers.name: Raptor Hunter
skillTiers.description: Call upon a bird of prey to assist you in hunting down your victims.

skillTiers.name: Hunting Net

value.name: Hunting Net
value.description: Throw a hunting net, entangling an enemy, preventing them from taking a single step for a duration, as well as heavily reducing their damage output.

skillTiers.description: Throw a hunting net, entangling an enemy, preventing them from taking a single step for a duration, as well as heavily reducing their damage output.

skillTiers.name: Eagle Eye
skillTiers.description: Firing rapidly allows you to enter a state of increased focus, replenishing your energy with ease and increasing the piercing damage of your projectiles. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.

skillTiers.name: Razor Sharpening

value.name: Razor Sharpening
value.description: Increase the piercing potential of the weapons of the nearby allied units.{^n}{^y}Requires a bow, a thrown weapon, a sword or a spear.

skillTiers.description: Increase the piercing potential of the weapons of the nearby allied units.{^n}{^y}Requires a bow, a thrown weapon, a sword or a spear.

skillTiers.name: Magical Winds
skillTiers.description: Concentrate a great amount of magical energy in a single, powerful projectile that damages all enemies in its path.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.{^n}{^y}Transfers flat damage outside of the wielded weapon.

skillTiers.name: Monster Hunter
skillTiers.description: Special training allows you to face all kinds of demons and giants with no hesitation.

skillTiers.name: Bloodletting
skillTiers.description: Become an expert at causing internal bleeding with specialized fighting techniques using piercing weapons.

skillTiers.name: Blinding Winds
skillTiers.description: Intense rays of light emerge from your projectiles, which blind your enemies, making them unable to aim properly or defend themselves.

skillTiers.name: Split Shots
skillTiers.description: This special technique allows you to fire multiple projectiles at once to manage large groups more easily.{^n}{^y}Requires either a bow or a thrown weapon.

skillTiers.name: Intimidating Screech

value.name: Intimidating Screech
Intimidating Screech
value.description: The raptor's screech sends a shivering wave, which lowers enemies' resistance and damage dealt for a short while.
The raptor's screech sends a shivering wave, which lowers enemies' resistance and damage dealt for a short while.

skillTiers.description: The raptor's screech sends a shivering wave, which lowers enemies' resistance and damage dealt for a short while.

skillTiers.name: Bandages

value.name: Bandages
value.description: While you venture in unknown regions, carrying a pack of bandages is useful, as they are effective for protecting wounds from aggravating and enable accelerated recovery. Additonally, they may be used on allied units.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.description: While you venture in unknown regions, carrying a pack of bandages is useful, as they are effective for protecting wounds from aggravating and enable accelerated recovery. Additonally, they may be used on allied units.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Acute Precision
skillTiers.description: The projectiles of your ranged weapons pass through enemies and deal increased piercing damage.

skillTiers.name: Ranger's Prowess

value.name: Ranger's Prowess
value.description: Rangers can share their techniques with companions and allies, improving their damage output and speed for a short moment.

skillTiers.description: Rangers can share their techniques with companions and allies, improving their damage output and speed for a short moment.

skillTiers.name: Silver Feathers

value.name: Silver Feathers
value.description: Your raptor may now throw its piercing feathers to damage enemies from afar and disturb their eyesight.

skillTiers.description: Your raptor may now throw its piercing feathers to damage enemies from afar and disturb their eyesight.

skillTiers.name: Storm of Arrows
skillTiers.description: Firing multiple arrows up in the sky allows unavoidable attacks from unsuspected angles.{^y} Inflicts damage twice per second.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.{^n}{^y}Transfers flat damage outside of the wielded weapon.

skillTiers.name: Survival Techniques

value.name: Survival Techniques
value.description: As a master of survival in the wild, you may teach your allies the basics of survivability; this knowledge can be applied in combat to avoid more attacks than a regular fighter would.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.description: As a master of survival in the wild, you may teach your allies the basics of survivability; this knowledge can be applied in combat to avoid more attacks than a regular fighter would.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Languid Death
skillTiers.description: With hunter's profound knowledge of poison lore, you find ingredients to prepare deadly substances which infect wounds, preventing them from regenerating.

skillTiers.name: Vampire Shots
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Upgrade your magical shots to drain life from your enemies and restore yours. This technique, however, will greatly increase the energy required to cast the skill.

skillTiers.name: Divine Defiance
skillTiers.description: The resolve of a monster slayer amplifies equally to the greatness of the challenge before them.

skillTiers.name: Scavenger

value.name: Scavenger
value.description: Feeding on the flesh of its sufferers and tracking those who attempt to flee becomes trivial to the most relentless raptors.

skillTiers.description: Feeding on the flesh of its sufferers and tracking those who attempt to flee becomes trivial to the most relentless raptors.

skillTiers.name: Tempest
skillTiers.description: Arrows flying through the sky absorb the elemental energy and deliver it on your unfortunate enemies.

skillTiers.name: Headshot
skillTiers.description: Shots perfectly aimed at the head may cause critical damage and knock out enemies.

skillTiers.name: Scorching Edge
skillTiers.description: {^g}Passive Modifier{^n}{^w}Instead of sharpening your arrows, you dip them into ignited oil to melt your opponent's armor. However, the tar-like complexion of the arrow will make it dull.{^n}{^y}Requires a bow.

skillTiers.name: Devastating Shots
skillTiers.description: Perfected skills with ranged weapons allows you to aim where your opponents least expect it in a blink of an eye and deal extraordinary damage.{^n}{^y}Requires either a bow or a thrown weapon.

skillTiers.name: Light Armor Specialist

value.name: Light Armor Specialist
value.description: Learn how to adjust and customize the armor pieces of you and your allies, allowing for faster movement and an increase in durability.

skillTiers.description: Learn how to adjust and customize the armor pieces of you and your allies, allowing for faster movement and an increase in durability.

skillTiers.name: Ominous Arrows
skillTiers.description: Multiple piercing arrows, imbued with dreadful essence, explode in a small burst upon contact.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.{^n}{^y}Transfers flat damage outside of the wielded weapon.

skillTiers.name: Dragon Arrow
skillTiers.description: Launch a scorching, fiery arrow that explodes upon hitting the first enemy it encounters and deals a great deal of burn damage over time.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.{^n}{^y}Transfers flat damage outside of the wielded weapon.

skillTiers.name: Astuteness
skillTiers.description: Having more cunning and cleverness than your opponents allows you to use different defensive strategies to outsmart your foes.

skillTiers.name: Confined Technique
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Studying the dark arts, your arrows become ethereal and they tear their victims soul apart, albeit not their body.
